prime.core.traits.IFreezable

type
interface
subclasses
prime.media.IMediaStream
available in
swf
Interface for components who can be frozen. A frozen component stops with what it was doing (f.e. playing video) but doesn't update its interface accordingly. After it's defrosted, the component continues with what it was doing before.

Instance Methods

defrost() : Void

Method will defrost the component and restore the component to its previous state.

freeze() : Void

Method will freeze the component and store it previous state

isFrozen() : Bool

flag indicating wether the current state is frozen or not
